TopicTitle: Fuel Tanks & Engines Sorted by Size...

Articles.Content:
I know you can sort by size, and I know most of you know the parts so well that you automatically know which parts are 2.5m or 3.5 or 5 or w/e but, at a glance everything looks relatively the same size so I find myself clicking on several things just to see if it will fit with my 2.5m rocket design. 

Would be nice it would sort them by rocket diameter size, or if for example 2.5m parts had a blue background or what ever. I know we can make a custom menu, but I have no problem with the other tabs and that means going into the custom tabs each time. I dunno I'm weird!  Would this be difficult to do?
